name: TA Simulator
description:
TA Simulator is your one and only Tufts computer science TA office hours simulator!

Simulate the experience of being a TA, trapped within the confines of Halligan, and learn different methods of helping your students in different scenarios!

Made by Jingqi Yang and Ben London for Comp 5 final project, Fall 2018.

NOTE: The Unity web GL player is a bit buggy, so if the keys are unresponsive (or the audio doesn't play), you'll need to download the game. Sorry about the inconvenience!
